alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:25AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 2 feet. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country will be impacted by heavy accumulating snow. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact travel over US Highway 14.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
